description_html:
Nepal skies are seen through the eyes of Jakub Staron. His fascination with Tibetan patterns and cultural influences inspired him to create the wool and bamboo silk rug above. Skye is a masterpiece of weaving since over 50 shades of blue were woven into the rug to create the impressive, well-designed ombre effect.

Quality: Hand Knotted
Fiber: Wool
Country: Nepal
